Title: Terrible service. International harm.

Content: While I was enjoying all the exercises and tools the app provided, their support and customer service is AWFUL!!! I lost access to my account. I had request a password reset but my email was not linked to an account. I‚Äôm not sure how that could be when I was being charged a subscription. None the less I emailed their support 3 times and have received ZERO follow up or communication. I pretty much spent the money for the subscription and wasn‚Äôt able to even use the app. Hopefully this reaches them and they‚Äôll do something about their terrible costume service.
Title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE

Content: I didn‚Äôt know what to expect at first. I was thinking how hard could this be, but I was wrong these simple movements can be a bit challenging.  However, when the workout is over I feel really good and start my day with a bit more energy.  I am expecting that will increase with my doing these exercises daily.  Thank you
Title: Day 4 of 28 Days

Content: I have been working out in the gym, lifting weights, and cardio for years. But never found anything to really resolve my stress and anxiety. This app was exactly what I needed. I didn‚Äôt want to go to a yoga studio or somewhere in public, I needed a quiet space with direction, this is exactly what I have been looking for. I intend to keep this app even at the end of the 12 weeks.
Title: Just what I needed.

Content: I came  across better me being advertised as a ‚Äúsomatic program‚Äù to release emotion and reduce stress. Come to find it‚Äôs just a weight loss app with a very generic ‚Äúsomatic‚Äù section. I reached out to the company immediately and only received template form responses with offers to extend my program. I‚Äôve received three of these with no actual human contact and no acknowledgement of their being misleading. I‚Äôm a pilates and yoga teacher who specializes in nervous system regulation and somatic release. It looks like they‚Äôre just using buzz words to target customers with no ability to deliver on what they‚Äôre offering.
Title: Sketchy and generic

Content: This is my first time using this app, saw the ad on Snapchat. I‚Äôm enjoying the little workout thus far, (second day of the 28 although I skipped one day because I was sore and forgot to stretch after) but I enjoy that their is a full course meal for the day each day for daysss! I like the it gives you rest after each exercise even though I usually skip it because I am pumped! So far so good!
Title: First time using

Content: Do not be like me and fall for their Instagram ads. The workouts do not load properly and no one has responded to my inquiries for support or refund.   Since download and payment, I have only been able to fully access one 13 min workout. When I came back to try to do the next day‚Äôs workout, the videos wouldn‚Äôt load- only the countdown timers. So it would be counting down to a blank screen and no instructions for the move I‚Äôm supposed to be doing. I‚Äôve submitted a couple tickets for help with no response within a week. Very disappointing.
Title: Tech issues and no support

Content: Wouldn‚Äôt recommend to download the app to log calories, it‚Äôs so frustrating to log in the calories because everything is in ounces and then when you do convert it, it shows a lot more calories then the food has or it shows way less calories then the food has. The app doesn‚Äôt even save your foods that you logged the day before which is also difficult, because then you have to log it in again, the barcode scanner only snacks a few foods otherwise you have to put in all the info your self. Will not be using this app!!
Title: Disappointed

Content: I‚Äôm enjoying the app and especially like that the workouts switch up daily so you‚Äôre not doing the same moves everyday, with the exception being the 7-minute workout where the workouts stay consistent everyday.  The only reason I‚Äôm not giving this app 5 stars is because it does not write the data of calories burned to the Health App, only the workout minutes are recorded. It‚Äôd be nice for the developers to fix this with the next update.
Title: Great app!

Content: I really love this app! It‚Äôs convenient and easy. I was always the one who didn‚Äôt know how to exercise my body and physical pain I have. This app is super easy to follow.. recipes are simple and exercises can be done in front room while you have children! The only reason I didn‚Äôt give it 5 stars is because the meals are all the same weekly. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm still on the trial or if it‚Äôs just that way. Other than that I would say definitely 5 stars.
Title: LOVE THIS APP

Content: I really like this app. The exercises are great and I love the design. The only problem I have is with the meal plan aspect. There is no option to change meals which is a massive problem because there is also no option to list what I‚Äôm allergic to. I can‚Äôt eat seafood and it suggests meals with seafood often, I‚Äôm not on a vegetarian diet either so it would be really great to be able to filter out the seafood options and/or be able to pick another meal.
Title: Exercises are great, but the meal plan...

Content: It‚Äôs hard to find an app with quality workouts on your phone that you enjoy. BetterMe has solve that problem for me.   I also love the variety you get. The mental coaching, nutrition, dancing, yoga, gym, and calisthenics are all videos of the highest quality.   There‚Äôs something I‚Äôm forget most likely but I think you get the point. This app is worth you time and money.
Title: Love it!!

Content: I purchased a subscription through an ad, and sent a link to download the app. My purchased plan was supposed to populate when I logged in through the app, but that didn‚Äôt happen. It made me complete a survey again, and kept trying to get me to purchase additional plans. I can‚Äôt even tell at this point if I have a purchased plan, and it‚Äôs impossible to reach customer service. The help tab indicates there should be an option to manage subscription, but it‚Äôs not there Would not recommend due to the difficulty of using.
Title: Difficult to use

Content: Decided to give this a try based on social media ads (the ones that said ‚Äúmy friend decided to cancel her gym membership and do this instead‚Äù).   Don‚Äôt cancel your gym membership. Haha. The program wants you to be active enough to burn 790 calories a day but their workouts only burn like 40-60 calories. So this is not something you do instead of the gym. You still need the gym.   I was looking simply to change up my workout routine, but this was not for me. I only lasted a few days because the workouts felt more like just stretching and not working out at all.   Ok app if you‚Äôre looking for somewhere to track activities, food, water, etc but not as a workout plan. If I‚Äôm unlocking workouts daily, they should cover my full calorie burning goal for the day (or at least way more than 1/10 of it!).
Title: OK tracking app, not great workout program

Content: I seem to be spending just as much, if not more, time rearranging my mat and pausing the video to do so, for the upcoming positions, as I do on the actual workouts. I watch the video(s) so I‚Äôm having to move my phone and find ways to prop it up to do so, because I‚Äôm going from standing with my mat horizontal to the wall, to laying down with it vertical , to standing with it horizontal again to switching it to vertical, then back to laying down, then to standing with horizontal. Move my phone and mat turns into a workout in itself.
Title: Irritated

Content: The workout is great! Works the whole body and I did work up a sweat.  Only downside is I didn‚Äôt have enough time in between the next move to get into position. (Takes me some time to get down to the floor and back up again) If there is a way to choose how much time we have in between moves, that would be helpful.  Looking forward to the rest of the program.
Title: First day

Content: UPDATE: My review literally says I have a torn rotator cuff and I would like there to be modification options for injuries and your response literally said ‚Äú ‚Ä¶Still, it's hard for us and other users to understand what stands behind your negative feedback. And we would appreciate sharing further details of what could have caused an unpleasant experience.‚Äù  My two star review just dropped to one due to your lack of personalization and what seems to be an automatic response.  I have a torn rotator cuff and it would be nice if there were options so I can avoid the plank like exercises.
Title: Modifications would be nice

Content: it‚Äôs not bad, the workouts are pretty good and i like the trackers it has, it‚Äôs been helping me watch what i eat and how much i move more often. however, i don‚Äôt like how it‚Äôs constantly advertising the subscription, i cant buy it now and i never will. also, i wish there could be a better way to track your steps, rather than relying on the health app, since mine isn‚Äôt that accurate, plus, i‚Äôm in school and i can‚Äôt track my steps like in pe, since i can‚Äôt use my phone at that time. it could be useful to be able to include miles and the average steps taken within a mile? i don‚Äôt know if that would work, or if it exists already, it was just a thought. other than that, i enjoy this app so far!
Title: nice app!!

Content: I‚Äôve been very interested in starting my intermittent fasting journey and though this app would work for just that. However it does NOT and just left me feeling frustrated because the app is not user friendly and I spent my money on a useless product. The fasting option is not user friendly and I became so frustrated when trying to use it that I just gave up. I will say the recipes looked good but I will never cook them as I am moving on to a different IF platform. I sent a request for my money back and will keep you posted. Please do better guys!
Title: Extremely frustrating

Content: I haven't worked out in years, Burt out from other demands in life. Put on 60 pounds in the last year. I thought this will be easier to get me stated. This program challenges me and gets my day started. It's hard work I can tell it's working: I'm sore so and glad I chose beginner lol! It's a great low stress way to get going again on your health journey IMHO.
Title: I under estimated

Content: This app has good ideas but absolutely the worst application of those ideas. I wanted the Mediterranean diet plan but it keeps giving me keto....3 days in a row. Email tech support  & they tell me to reregister so for about 5 minutes it works. Leave the app & come back to keto.  I have had it. No one should have to spend this much time trying to get what they registered for. So far they are refusing to refund my membership fees so I am going to complain to Pinterest where I found the app. I will come back here every day & leave the review they deserve. If I could give them  a no star review I would.
Title: Worst app ever!!!!!!

Content: I sent an email in August pertaining to a charge I wasn‚Äôt aware of and didn‚Äôt get a response until today...OCTOBER 5th. I had this app for probably over a year and got charged $100 for buying something through the internet, but why would I buy it through the internet if I‚Äôd had it for months.     I‚Äôm not saying I didn‚Äôt do this on accident (don‚Äôt think I did), but I am a college student who gets $150 a paycheck, trust me I‚Äôm not spending 2/3 of that deliberately. That charge really put me back for the rest of the month. However, if that is the case, the time it took to get back to me was still less than ideal.
Title: Customer Service

Content: They lead you on to think that you would pay for your subscriptions weekly. Come to find out you pay for all $120 at once. I checked my bank account and I was confused as to why it was so low until I realized what happened. They have no responded to emails or phone calls. I want my money back. I am a student who can‚Äôt afford to drop $120 at once.  Update-  Went back into the app to see what I could do and it kicked me out and asked me to pay all over again. This is a scam. I want my money back. Not to mention there is no way to contact anyone for help. Do not get this app. This needs to be fixed immediately.
Title: I am fuming

Content: How come I am not able to finish a program. It only allows me to go to one session!  That is dumb! If I want to get fit I want it for free, the yoga better me allows me to look a meal plans for free and continue my classes why cant this one. I am not trying to say that this is a bad app it is just that I think you should fix these issues. I love the app don‚Äôt get me wrong just not really  how I can‚Äôt get fit! Thank you for taking time out of your day to read thisü§ó
Title: Ehhh

Content: Wanted to try the ‚ÄúFree Trial‚Äù but the only way to see the $ charged for premium is to sign up first. It‚Äôs $10 a week-much more than others out there, there you‚Äôre signed up.  They bury the contact information in the contract and there no way to cancel within the app. ‚ÄúThey‚Äù in support say ‚Äúthey can‚Äôt cancel for me‚Äù even though I‚Äôm notifying within the time frame and the instructions I‚Äôve been give  within my iphone settings don‚Äôt jive. Feels more like a scam. Beware. Other than that it would could be helpful but seriously just a reminder/alert type program for $40 a month.
Title: Terrible to navigate Cancelation offer

Content: Overall, I like the app. I really need those reminders that come when I set them up. I pair my fitness pal to monitor my diet. It would be nice to pair more apps together to have the ultimate health and fitness app!! I just am able to get back into shape after a kidney transplant and needed some guidance. I went ahead and paid the $59 to have it permanently. I keep that in mind when I don‚Äôt feel like exercising.. I hate wasting money AND need to get healthy and strong!  So far, I‚Äôm doing good!!
Title: Pairing apps

Content: I‚Äôve had this app for like 3 days and I‚Äôve loved it so much, the workouts, the water tracker and calorie tracker, but this morning I went into the app and found it won‚Äôt let me see ‚Äúmy plan‚Äù I have to pay for it? Which is weird cause I didn‚Äôt start any free trial to see my ‚Äúplan‚Äù I might be my phone but I reset my phone and it is still the same
Title: Love it

Content: I paid for a subscription through my Apple ID yet there‚Äôs no access to the app using my Apple ID email. I‚Äôve tried all three email addresses that I could‚Äôve possibly used to reset the password and all of them say they are not able to access the account if I create a new account it wants me to pay for a new subscription. I‚Äôve emailed them twice and I‚Äôve heard nothing back. I‚Äôm really disappointed because I wanted to use this app very badly and yet there is no using it and they‚Äôve gotten my money
Title: Paid subscription but can‚Äôt access account

Content: I‚Äôve been using this for a bit. First off I didn‚Äôt want the app it took me money so I had no choice. Second I have not logged in a couple weeks cause my schedule has been hectic. Finally slowing down to back in and it logged me out and said I don‚Äôt exist even though the app gives me non stop remainders to log. What a joke this is. Also forget someone helping you the only thing you get is auto replies with options that don‚Äôt pertain to the question. Beyond frustrated
Title: Can‚Äôt get logged in

Content: I thought finally this app will finally be the app that helps me get it all. After paying for a subscription you still don‚Äôt unlock everything. No workout. Not good meal plans. Hard to customize. Not worth it and when trying to get in contact with customer service they don‚Äôt respond. Try calling they don‚Äôt help. Getting a refund they don‚Äôt help. App is useless and not worth a penny.  *Customer service is horrible. Was told to contact them. Contacted them many times no one responds back not worth the money or time. *
Title: Not worth it horrible service *update*

Content: The app has so many ways that it is lacking. It wants you add calories but is not easy to use. The food tracker needs a lot of work. A scanner and good builder would be better. This only allows you to get close to what you are actually doing. Counting my steps would be great if they allowed FITBIT to access my information. I don‚Äôt want to but a whole new watch when I have one. I will say one good thing is the exercise. They are nice and I like the how to videos. This app is not worth the subscription you need to get it.
Title: Subpar

Content: Hello,  Thank you for responding to my negative review on your services, kindly note that i have done one time only (two or three months back) a purchase of one service and i did not select automatic renewal for the service and since last month i am trapped in this subscription which i am not able to stop it and there is no clear process or guide to stop the deduction to my bank card and since last month i am complaining through apple store without any proper action, please stop my subscription immediately!
Title: There is no clear way of stopping the service !!!

Content: I‚Äôm almost 63 with 7 hip replacements and 12 dislocations. I have spina bifida and lymphedema. I‚Äôm not supposed to be able to walk. I do, but pain and muscle spasms are a big problem. I have a rare autoimmune that effects my muscles. This was the perfect workout for me I can already tell after one workout that my back pain has eased. I need to move and stretch I just need guidance. Thanks
Title: Movement

Content: After submitting a bad review based on what looked it be incorrect charges on my account, they very quickly and kindly assured me that the listings were only options not actual charges. I was so thankful for the quick reply and professional service! The app itself was great I just didn‚Äôt take time to use it to its capacity. Thank you betterme!
Title: Great support team!

Content: Cancelling my subscription was the most time consuming, frustrating experience I‚Äôve had in recent memory. In fact, while my dissatisfaction with the overall app was pretty high, it is nothing compared to my unhappiness with the process of actually cancelling my subscription. This process included being charged multiple times, fighting for a refund, and being completely ignored by customer service on several occasions. I think I burned more calories from stress in this process than I did working out with the app.
Title: Want to cancel your subscription? Good luck

Content: Hi guys I really recommend BetterMe because I have tried so many workout apps but none of them have worked BetterMe tells you how many calories to eat How much water to drink when you should do your workouts they give you but it is all your option and choice they ask questions for your health and it is only to them who see so don‚Äôt worry about that I am not gonna bore you so go get STARTED YAY WHOO !!!!!!!!!!!!!
Title: BetterMeRocks

Content: I paid a dollar to give it a try, the trial was 7 days, as soon as I got in all I was getting was offers trying to upswell me all kind of plans and add-ons, after navigating the app, it was disappointing because whatever access you did have it was nothing that other apps do not already offer for free and with a better interface to be honest. I reached out to cancel my subscription, Ellie answered that is now canceled but I still can access through the end of my trial, that was a lie because the app would not go past the subscription expired screen, very disappointing.
Title: Dishonest and all about selling you more stuff

Content: I download the app and paid for three months. The application stop working within the first week. All menus were locked and I did not have access.  I emailed them I did not hear back until the subscription was expired.  I keep requesting for a refund and I keep getting the run arounds. Please ‚ÄúDownload the app again‚Äù, ‚Äúwe gave you a free month‚Äù and today it was the highlight ‚Äúwe reset your password go ahead and reuse our app‚Äù! ( I did not ask for a reset I do not want to use your app I clearly requested for a refund).  If I could give zero starts I would have! Do not download the app, they are a joke!
Title: Poor customer service

Content: The app does not offer an in-app cancellation during the trial period, nor does it show up under Subscriptions under Settings in my iPhone or in the App Store as a subscribed app. You cannot login to their website to cancel using the login created. My browser remembered the password yet I was denied entry. No other option for login offered.   The intro offer does not reflect in the confirmation trial subscription. Much higher price. The ‚Äúreceipt‚Äù is full of misspelled words. Again, no cancellation possible without going through the entire trial period and being charged the wrong, non-trial offer amount. This is NOT legit.
Title: Suspect Cancellation practices

Content: This app should warn people that the easy exercises are far from easy.  I was excited when I read about this app, but the first exercise included a plank.  I cannot do a plank, so I was immediately discouraged.  Maybe they will develop a senior me app or some for the true newbie that allows you to build up. If you are healthy, then this app is for you.  The app is nice as far as the development is concerned.
Title: To Advanced for this Newbie

Content: I liked the original version of the app better because you chose the muscle group and had a 10 minute workout. I‚Äôm getting used to this updated version. I wish it would separate workouts with weights and workouts without weights. I have weights at home but not while traveling. I‚Äôd like to incorporate more weights in my home workouts. Overall it makes it easy to workout each day.
Title: Keeps me motivated to do a little workout every day.

Content: The account seems to have trouble being linked from phone to iPad or other device. Not tracking progression across platforms . Example phone says I‚Äôm on Day one, iPad says day 4, if I want to use the phone it wants me to complete 1-3 to open day 4.   Am I missing something? I submitted email last week regarding this?
Title: Issue

Content: I signed up for the 7 day free trial, but after seeing the content I am not impressed. Especially for how much it costs after the 7 days. I could just google all of these workouts. There‚Äôs also a few free apps with the similar workouts I‚Äôve seen.   What‚Äôs frustrating is there is no cancel subscription button anywhere. It should not be that difficult to cancel. I‚Äôve emailed someone and haven‚Äôt heard back yet, so I‚Äôll update this review with how good the customer support ends up being.   Overall there are better apps for way cheaper out there.
Title: Not Impressed

Content: When I received my band, I contacted help support to help me managing my subscription. The app have a great support team working in this area. Tony was my helper and he answered right away my message, explaining what to do and solving all my issues. It is so good have people like you that really manage questions and situations so well! Thanks again for all your support!
Title: Help support is awesome

Content: But the workouts were kind of hard to follow because: one set is on the floor then switches to the standing position then back to the wall and then back to the floor, it‚Äôs too much up and down for me I almost get dizzy. It would be better if the workouts had a better flow to them in regards to the frequency of the changing positions. I got the watch to go with the app but since the workouts are a bit frustrating I opted out of the subscription.
Title: Good app but

Content: I signed up because the ad declared it was about breathwork and exercises to reduce anxiety. I signed up to try out, installed the app and immediately saw it was a calorie-counting program and the exercises were just run of the mill and NOT FOR ME. Within less than 24 hours I requested me money back and had to search high and low for customer service. Also - no phone number to be found to speak to a human. I still want my money back! I never once used this program and never plan to. I‚Äôm waiting for a human to respond to my many many emails. Thanks
Title: Beware! This app is a scam

Content: Purchased the plan for wall Pilates and was started off with sessions that might be a challenge for a wheel chair bound nursing home resident.  Gave the feedback that it was too easy but the app did not adjust the difficulty.  Sent a letter to support and didn‚Äôt receive a response.  Also purchased coaching and when I tried to sign up for a coach it wanted to charge me again.  The psychology articles were interesting- that is where they got some points.  I was basically scammed about 40 dollars.
Title: Disappointing and a rip off

Content: I purchased this exercise video because I had foot surgery and had to be non/weightbearing for eight weeks. I was concerned about losing condition at the age of 68 (not that I had much to begin with.) these videos were just perfect for my level of non-fitness. All of the exercises could be done without putting weight on my foot. I highly recommend them.
Title: Good jinvestment!

Content: This app would be wonderful, if you were trying to lose weight. However, for someone who‚Äôs trying to become stronger than overcoming an eating disorder this app is horrible.  I specifically but that I was trying to get healthier and build muscles. I‚Äôm at a healthy weight and just trying to be more active. Regardless of that, I continuously got notification after notification about losing weight. It seems as that‚Äôs the whole purpose of the app. Which is totally fine, just NOT what I was looking for, or expecting.
Title: Triggering for Someone Recovering from an Eating Disorder

Content: I don‚Äôt have the subscription but I love that it still gives you the workouts. It keeps track of your progress for you to keep you on track and (if you have the subscription) even has meal plans to help you lose that extra weight. I use it almost daily and love that the workouts are short so they‚Äôre easy to squeeze into your day.
Title: Love this app

Content: I really thought this app would me while I was healing from ankle stress fracture. Unfortunately the app didn‚Äôt help me do what I thought it would do. I cancelled the subscription 10 days after my initial payment on joining the app. Surprise when the trial period was over they charged me again. I reached out to them the same day of the charge and they cancelled the subscription but kept my money and offered an additional 2 months free to reconsider. I guess they forgot I didn‚Äôt like the app. There are better apps out there less expensive.
Title: Be careful they charge after you cancel

Content: This is absolutely disappointing. By signing up for a subscription, you don‚Äôt receive any additional service than what is offered with free download. How can you consider yourself Health Coaching subscription but then offer services for additional pricing and a la carte? Just call yourself a Calories, Water and Weight tracker (because that‚Äôs basically what the app is) and maybe some thoughtless workouts are included too‚Ä¶maybe. $4 per question to a coach? Absolutely ridiculous. Many misleading statements in this app. Save yourself and get an actual gym membership and an accessible coach.
Title: Disappointing

Content: Original review: Would like to be able to adjust start and end times for fasting. If I forget to hit start until 2 hours after I‚Äôve last eaten for the evening, have to fudge the end time too in order to accurately reflect number of hours fasted. Water intake should be flexible too to account for accidental taps which then reflect inaccurate intake. Also don‚Äôt want to be required to add the extraneous information on each custom food item and ‚Äúservings‚Äù should offer more options for measurement.  Updated: After a few days I found it simply too inflexible to be at all useful. Asked for and received a refund.
Title: Not for me

Content: This app is a complete waste of money. It says you only have to pay a one time fee but then wants to keep charging you. You can‚Äôt hear the workout videos. You have to enter in the same calorie information every time for the same exact meals. You can‚Äôt manually enter your steps. NO CUSTOMER SUPPORT. NO CONTACT INFORMATION. This app is constantly telling you to fast which isn‚Äôt healthy. For what this app charges it needs to have much better results and better customer service. Don‚Äôt waste your money. Find a better app with better results and better customer service.
Title: No good

Content: Worked great for three days. Now it has locked me out of all of the meals. When I try to choose one it says I have to pay again. I thought maybe it was a separate thing so I paid AGAIN and I‚Äôm still locked out of the meals. If I click ‚Äúrestore purchase ‚Äú it will allow me to look at the meal but then the app freezes. Bummer because I really thought the app was cool and I was happy to have found something that will allow me to meal plan as a vegetarian. üòû
Title: Worked great for three days

Content: The second I got on the app, it automatically gave me a ton of options for paying money for the app. A couple days later after using it, it wouldn‚Äôt even let me log my walk, food, workouts, and more without paying. But other than that it‚Äôs great! I just wish I could get on my app again because now I don‚Äôt use it at all because I can‚Äôt without paying.
Title: Too much money

Content: This app does not show the subscription after purchase if you use PP to purchase the subscription.  When trying to cancel there is no where to make that happen.  There‚Äôs no email from you showing the registration or link where one can choose to cancel the subscription if you wish.  Other apps regardless of payment are able to do this cancel transaction from their Apple account directly.  But this one fails to do this.  It needs to be fixed.  I cannot cancel subscription from anywhere.
Title: Issue with your app.

Content: the ads show that you can get a better lifestyle by getting meal plans and realistic workouts, but other reviews not only claim that the workouts are not easy to do as the woman in the photo. ALSO, think you can get this free? well you have to pay for the meal plan, which i compromised, but after the second day - proud of starting a streak - i was let down by seeing you had to be a MEMBER to continue. why lead people on for two days, then letting us down on the third? now, i have to find another workout routine that‚Äôll fit me - hoping i still have motivation that i had with this.
Title: disappointing/let me down

Content: I‚Äôve been trying to cancel the free trial from the 2nd day, but regrettable unable to do so through the app or find any information in my email to contact them to do so. I‚Äôve been charge and I‚Äôm still unable to cancel the subscription! The only information the app gives you regarding cancellation is their policy on cancellation, but from what I‚Äôve read it doesn‚Äôt direct you to where or how to cancel prior to completion of the free trial, or even after the free trial into you paid subscription. I‚Äôm currently in communication with APPLE just to cancel! This is extremely frustrating! Not worth it in my personal opinion.
Title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!

Content: Love this app gives u the right amount of reps per workout when your first starting out so you don‚Äôt over work your self. And you can pick out what part of the body you wanna work out which I love. I tired the free trial for a week then forgot to cancel it but it‚Äôs alright because I really enjoy this app. I just hope the $40 it charged me wasn‚Äôt just for one month!
Title: Perfect workout!

Content: One day I was looking around on the App Store and I came across this app called Better Me and so I want to try it out see what it was about. So I did the first day exercises and it was good and I felt like I wanted to do it again so the next day I clicked on the button for next workout and it wouldn‚Äôt let me do it because I had to get a subscription like really I need money to go to the next section if I have to pat for money why don‚Äôt just go to the gym then. Like I don‚Äôt think that we should have to pay for us to take the time out of our day and exercise I think that should be changed to no money and let us workout.
Title: Newbie

Content: Menu is not so good. The list of ingredients don‚Äôt match with what you actually need at the directions part. The menu has the same recipes every week, and the same portion regardless the difference your weight and your target weight. It is hard to know if the amount of food you are eating is what you need to lose weight because it will be always the same and don‚Äôt specify how many calories you are eating. I would rate it higher if this app was just about exercise, but you charge a good amount of money for diet and losing weight.
Title: Great workouts, not so good menu

Content: Yeah so I never do reviews but I just want y‚Äôall to know if you download this app make sure you cancel your subscription or choose which subscription you want before the free trial is up. They charged me $42 without my permission. I did not choose that subscription. They will automatically charge you the most expensive subscription if you don‚Äôt choose or cancel it yourself.   I never used it, not even during the free trial but I thought I would give it a chance since I paid $42 and  yeah it‚Äôs okay but definitely not worth the cash in my opinion.
Title: My experience

Content: So far I am doing one week free trial and I love it ! Though I agree that it doesn‚Äôt have a diary where you can keep track of what you eat and how many calories are in, but I love the food choices they give you , set your schedule, and some exercises have timers and I personally think there should be a timer on reps just incase. 10 a month for me is a lot for just this kinda of things for an app yet its for a good cause.  So far the best app.
Title: One week in

Content: Doesn‚Äôt just have an amazing plan for you to follow with calorie counters, meal plans, workout plans, Activity goal trackers, etc.   It goes deep into the why we think the way we do, negative self talk which leads to more bad habits and how to overcome those.  I‚Äôve lost some wait already following just some of the steps.  Excited to learn and achieve more.
Title: Comprehensive

Content: They give first day on all the work outs free and once done you have to pay the subscription fee , $20 a month. When I did the first days worth of work outs I loved it. I was looking forward to the rest of the 27 days having shared and recommending it only to find out out it falsely led me on. The meal plans are free which is nice but I‚Äôd like to do it as a whole. It got me hyped up because I thought I had finally found an app that doesn‚Äôt make me have to pay for my health but I was wrong.
Title: If only wasn‚Äôt misleading

Content: I am an active person and was until recently when i started to have knee problems. You take a quiz so they should have a pretty clear idea of your category. There is even tab to check for knee problems but in all the wall yoga and other exercises there is NO modification for bad knees. This app may be good for an inactive person looking for a regiment but not someone that is active. I was once again reminded not to believe the hype from social media and get taken $.
Title: Basic. Basic. No mention of modifications

Content: I like better me and I how I can schedule my workouts and it counts the calories I burned but I don‚Äôt like how it‚Äôs not free because what if you don‚Äôt have no money but you want to exercise for free it‚Äôs not fair I want to continue using this app after the 7 day trial period but of course I can‚Äôt pay for it because I have no money and I really want to get my body right especially if I‚Äôm trying out to be a cheerleader anyway love the app hate the prices.
Title: Better me

Content: The app suddenly changed today and the $200 worth of recipe ingredients are a waste because all the recipes for the ‚Äúmeal plan‚Äù disappeared. Suddenly I was snapped into a keto meal plan and I have no way of contacting anyone who can help. I signed out to re-load the page and suddenly I have no way of getting back in. My ‚Äúsubscription‚Äù is still active but now I can‚Äôt cancel because I can‚Äôt get in. The email help is extremely inefficient. Also the coaches I used to have are gone and they want me to re-subscribe to everything. I am hungry because I was just about to follow a recipe for breakfast and it is lost.
Title: Locked out and no help.

Content: I started this app, and it seemed great. The meal plans need a little work. Better explanation on how to cook some of them. The food itself is good. I like the workouts, and how you they show you what to do. My issue is, and I‚Äôve been trying to reach someone. Yesterday, i kept getting a lock on my meals to upgrade for the year. Now, today, i can‚Äôt even get into the app. I spent $20 for a month, and not even a week in. I can‚Äôt access anything. Maybe someone can help me quicker on here.
Title: Annoyed at this point..

Content: I left a review about a month ago saying that my app was glitching and wouldn‚Äôt let me save my progress and continue my workout. All the developer responded with was ‚Äú try force closing the app or uninstalling and reinstalling‚Äù they even tried to tell me to reinstate my purchase. Like I already didn‚Äôt do that. I even wrote an email to them to try and help with the glitch. No response. I loved the workouts and how the app was set up, but with crappy software developers and even crappier customer service I canceled my subscription and deleted the app. Moved on to a way better workout app.
Title: If I could leave negative stars I would.

Content: I wish I had something good to say about this app. From the few workouts I‚Äôve sampled, it truly looked promising. Unfortunately, the app crashed after I completed any workout I tried, not saving any of my progress. Restarting my phone didn‚Äôt help, so I tried reinstalling the app. Big mistake! Now I can‚Äôt access any workout without trying the 7-day trail - which I‚Äôm already subscribed too!! Kind of shortsighted on the developer‚Äôs part of you ask me. I‚Äôm disappointed, but I won‚Äôt cancel my free trail yet - in case someone from support is willing to help out.
Title: Glitchy App!

Content: The app is really good and you will enjoy the exercises and that‚Äôs why I went for the one month paid subscription because simple that is all what you get. 28 days worth of exercise. Nothing new. So once I was done with them I thought I would be able to replay them the next month but what I get is either I pay for another new month for the exact same thing or the app becomes completely useless.  If you want people to pay more then at least do something new to your app.  Deleting it...
Title: One month subscription is more than enough!

Content: Last night I downloaded the app and got the premium subscription. After seeing the meal options for vegetarians, I was not pleased. I would really like a refund because somehow, I got the 6 month plan and paid $41!! A lot of the meal ideas were foods that I do not eat or enjoy. Please get back to me. The workouts look very good and I can not wait to use them, but maybe when you update food options I will try meal planning again.  Besides that the exercise are great and I can not wait to start!
Title: Need Help ASAP

Content: I like the app and the workouts, but one thing that drives me INSANE is the way the app half mutes anything you‚Äôre listening to while you‚Äôre in a workout. I don‚Äôt need to hear the countdown more than I need to hear Beyonc√© when I‚Äôm doing some challenging move. Seriously, so not cool. And there is no way to mute it, or if there is, I couldn‚Äôt find it, either in-app or in my phone settings. PLEASE god let them fix this feature immediately!!
Title: Turn off in-app Sound

Content: I do enjoy this app! I love that I‚Äét reminds me to work out. And the workouts are so simple! But i never know if i am doing them correctly. I‚Äé never used the food part of the app because I‚Äét doesn‚Äôt seem to go with my needs. And I‚Äéts not reasonable food... I‚Äét was worth 9.99 until i got a trainer and she told me that this isn‚Äôt how you should be working your body out every night ! I do think I‚Äéts a great start if your just starting out and dabbling in work outs !
Title: I‚Äéts pretty good

Content: I have an eating disorder and I cannot track calories or meals. I wish I could turn on notifications for workouts only, and it would also be great if I could remove the calorie/meal tracking aspect all together. I really like the workouts, though, so I‚Äôm trying to stick with the app. I‚Äôm using my regular alarm to try and remind me, which is inconvenient.
Title: Wish I could customize more

Content: I would not suggest buying this app for any help with nutrition . I bought the 28 day challenge and the calories that app suggested ve their coach recommended were really far apart when I reached out to coach and let her know what I ve been eating she suggested the calories were a lot .. and they took so long replying to your queries that after a certain point you loose interest.  The 2 stars are for tracking they have great trackers and their database cover all foods including Indian meals which most of the apps don‚Äôt do

I purchased this app in May and without my confirmation they also purchase for private trainer (I did not wonted this). I wrote them so many times and tried to unsubscribe, also wrote them about refund, but no answer and no refund of course. After a month they automatically purchased again the same amount of money. I wore again so many emails, unsubscribe, delete account, delete app, wrote about refund but no one answer me. I think it‚Äôs scam and be careful.  P.s. third month and no response. I deleted app, unsubscribe but they are purchasing me again
Title: Refund

Content: So far I really think this app is amazing. I just downloaded last night and I‚Äôm glad that I did. Im enjoying the many helpful features this app has to offer. With the helpful tools they have to offer, I am amazed with how affordable it is for the basic plan it offers. I like the idea of having additional options if needed to add on.
Title: Awesome

Content: After seeing this I thought they have a tailored made work out for me. As a fluffy person wanted to work out more, I thought great they will teach me slow and steady knowing my weight. Ah no it‚Äôs literally a 6 second show you before you do it skinny person workout, they actually expected me to be able to reach behind and grab my leg/foot and stretch. I was once again in tears cause o can‚Äôt do it. There are NO beginner moves taught no workout challenge I could even possibly do even though I tried. Canceled next day, no refund offered.
Title: Don‚Äôt waste your money

Content: Yes this app/company is fraudulent.  I did the questions signed up.  Was so excited to get stared and it keeps telling me that my email doesn‚Äôt have an account.  I received confirmation that I had an account but the website/app doesn‚Äôt recognize that I do.  They charged my card (I can see it on my statement).  They won‚Äôt respond to any of my inquiries.  I am now going to have to call my credit card company and try to fight this and try to prevent further charges with the auto subscription that they do.
Title: I should have read the reviews fraudulent Company

Content: I have been looking for a good workout app that will actually help me! And I‚Äôve finally founded it! I love it! The workouts were not super hard to were you can‚Äôt even do it but not to easy to we‚Äôre you don‚Äôt even sweat, but this one had that perfect middle ground!!! I love it so much and highly recommend this app to anyone and everyone who is looking for a good workout app that will help you!
Title: I love it

Content: This is a great app and I recommend it but it needs some work. Constantly getting a gray  screen on some of the workouts. Several of the exercises depicted in the videos do not match the wording. Often the narrator will reference doing something for one amount of time in the work out specifies a different amount of time. Mostly small stuff but annoying when you don‚Äôt know what to do for an exercise round.
Title: Could easily be 5 stars

Content: UPDATE: The customer service has corrected the issue and refunded for services not performed.   Originally went to website to where you paid 9.99 for a meal plan to be emailed to you. What I get is redirecting to download this app with no meal plan and wrong information. Also paid 6.99 for an abs workout (again to be emailed to me as per the website said) and instead get nothing. Expecting to get refunded or will dispute charge
Title: Very misleading - Updated

Content: I sent several emails to the support line to fix whatever glitch is happening. when I uploaded this on my ipad so I could have a larger screen to work out with now my profile on both my iPad and my iPhone are not recognizing all aspects of my account nor my previous purchases.  Every attempt I have made at addressing this within my account or profile gets met with an error screen. Each request for assistance simply forwards my request with a ticket number to my email with zero correspondence with support.
Title: Beyond Frustrated!!

Content: It is a very good app but I don‚Äôt like when you are switching the workouts it automatically starts the timer without even knowing the workout and it takes some time to set up and then you don‚Äôt actually complete the whole time so maybe put the workout your doing next and some time like 5 seconds to set up for the workout
Title: Great but has some problems

Content: I wouldn‚Äôt change anything! The only thing I wish was better, is the food search. Not to compare, but fitness pal app has full restaurant menus for plus customers. It makes finding meals a lot easier. That‚Äôs my only critique. I‚Äôve lost 30 lbs in a month counting Valerie‚Äôs and water intake, along with the reading material and fasting guide!
Title: Love this app!

Content: Issue 1) I see all these interesting screenshots and videos promoting Better Me on Pinterest and other places that made me what to subscribe and so I do and I don‚Äôt see anything that was advertised.   Issue 2) There are over 30 different subscriptions - none of them state what they offer or what they do and from what I can tell they are all the same / so I‚Äôm paying more and it turns out it‚Äôs a weekly rate instead of a monthly rate.   Seems like a scam to me. This app could offer a ton more features and better content for a 10/week rate!
Title: Very confusing

Content: It‚Äôs my first day and first exercise but I‚Äôm not impressed. It moves from one exercise to the next too quickly and it doesn‚Äôt explain what to do until you start doing it. There‚Äôs no time to figure out whether you‚Äôre positioned correctly or going the exercise correctly unless you stop the vid and read the instructions. I don‚Äôt see how the workouts can be effective if I have to keep stopping or if I have yo race to get in positron for the next exercise. I‚Äôm going to do a few more, but right now I feel like I just wasted 15 minutes of my life:
Title: Not impressed

Content: I was so excited to find this app from an instagram add. Unfortunately the videos they are selling to us depict only an extremely small portion of the offered workouts. For advanced wall Pilates workouts, there are only a handful and not enough variety to justify the subscription price. I had to do multiple workouts to feel I got a deep conditioning, and I was quickly bored with the lack of variety.  If you are a beginner looking to try new things and get fit, this may be for you.
Title: Not as advertised

Content: Updating my review because I‚Äôm warming up to the app. At first I was turned off by all of the upsell options that were promoting more weight loss. I did not ask for weight loss in my plan. However, after getting started with the workouts, I am really enjoying them. I‚Äôm glad I bought the 3 month plan because I definitely want to continue these workouts.
Title: Good workouts

Content: If you opt in for the trial month, be sure to set a reminder to cancel because the usual ‚Äúsubscription review‚Äù in your settings WILL NOT SHOW THIS. I‚Äôve been using that feature as a way to review subscriptions that maybe I‚Äôve forgotten about, but this app helped me realize that you need to literally go through EVERY APP on your phone to be sure you aren‚Äôt paying for things you don‚Äôt use/aren‚Äôt worth it üòí
Title: ***Doesn‚Äôt Show Up on Subscriptions!!!***

Content: Sometimes I see a video and sometimes I do not. 20% yes and 80%.   However, I do need video-How to do‚Äù help. I have to go to the How To section a lot because the first video is not working. The ‚Äúhow to‚Äù i have to read and hope I understand it. It causes more time which then I can‚Äôt finish the program.  Otherwise, I love the App and it is helping me get into a routine of stretching before I do a couple levels up work out‚Ä¶ A blessing for age 59
Title: Struggle with consistency with APP

Content: So I purchased the app and the meal  plan,went through it looked it up,and moved it around and I did not like it or didn‚Äôt hit my needs. so I go ahead and cancel that subscription and deleted the app send an email to see if I can get my money back because obviously I didn‚Äôt use it. I pretty much purchased it to look through it then I deleted it and unsubscribe right away, and I‚Äôm still charged so I would like to get my money back. Keep in mind that  I didn‚Äôt have the app on my phone for more than 10 minutes.
Title: Doesn‚Äôt fit my need!

Content: I downloaded the app, then I tried opening the app and it wouldn‚Äôt let me sign in. I did reset password but the email I received said there was no account with this email so I figured I didn‚Äôt download/sign up properly, no loss. HOWEVER, BetterMe decided to continue to bill me for this subscription.   I have emailed numerous times to get this resolved and while they say a human will contact you in 8 hours, it‚Äôs been weeks. It is yet to be seen if I‚Äôll be charged another month but I don‚Äôt see why they wouldn‚Äôt.  I may have cancel that cc entirely. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
Title: Does BetterMe really exist?

Content: I purchased this plan because it said it came with meal prep plans. It asked what I did and did not eat and I put that in. The next day they sent over the meal plan and for every single meal it contained food I said I did not eat. I emailed them and asked for a refund less then 24 hours later and they replied refusing although I had not used anything in the app because I opened the app. Do not purchase this plan, it is completely misleading and they are not helpful when it comes to anything. If you do pay for it, use PayPal so you can dispute it and get a refund easier then a debit card.
Title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR BUY!!!! üôÖ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Content: I honestly really like this app and what it has to offer, what I don‚Äôt like is that it crams the subscription down your throat even though it says it offers a ‚Äò free ‚Äò meal plan and exercise plans. The meal plan was never free it keeps telling me to buy the subscription and only day 1 for the exercises is free. Probably should state instead of only saying ‚Äò free ‚Äò. Really unfortunate too because I wanted to use this app it was really great the first day I used it. It‚Äôd be nice if they could offer something at least for people who don‚Äôt want a subscription or can‚Äôt afford it.
Title: No thanks

Content: I downloaded this app because it was a free basic app for exercises and support that said ‚Äúin app purchases‚Äù, which I didn‚Äôt do. Aside from giving my information to figure out how much water to drink, etc. I didn‚Äôt use the app. Then noticed I was being charged 9.99 for two weeks in a row. I tried to get to settings to figure out where I had authorized such a recurring charge and it wouldn‚Äôt let me past an authorization screen to provide my data to third parties. I contacted Apple for a refund where I learned of BetterMe‚Äôs practice- thievery! Both of dollars and information- BEWARE
Title: Beware- weekly recurring charges without notice.

Content: I‚Äôm in my late 40‚Äôs and don‚Äôt want an intense cross-fit type workout ‚Äî but I do want to stay active and tone up. These 13-minute a day Pilates workouts are perfect for my lifestyle. Challenging enough to break a light sweat but not intimidating and easy to cross off my list. Makes me feel like I can really stick with this program!
Title: Just right!

Content: I thought it was a 7 day free trial and then after the trial I would get charged. I do not like the app. I dont want to use the app for 6 months. I have canceled my subscription can I please have a refund of what has been charged to my account? I am not very happy about this, And makes me not want to use this app even more now that I have been charged for something I will not use. I couldnt even see what the app was about until I chose a subscription. I have tried to e-mail support twice and both times I get an error message saying ‚Äúaddress not found‚Äù.
Title: Billing issues. Support E-mail not a real e-mail address

Content: I may change this review later but I have not been able to login to my account. It‚Äôs stating that it does not recognize (any) of my emails, so I cannot even login to use the services I paid for. Tried reaching out to customer service and have heard nothing. I‚Äôm annoyed and unhappy. I double checked my apple account to make sure I had an active subscription and I do. Deleting this app and canceling my subscription. Went to the Facebook group and other people are having issues too.
Title: Not allowing me to login - no customer service

Content: For like anything, ever.  It‚Äôs so easy and well done. You should market this apps Programming/ development for other services too!   It makes me want to try new things and exercise more.  I‚Äôve told all my friends about it. It‚Äôs exactly the right tempo based on my answers to some personal questions.  Thanks!
Title: This is the best app I‚Äôve ever used!

Content: I am a 61 yr old female with Rheumatoid arthritis. Today was my first day.  There was not enough time to figure out my next position because I was consistently alternating between floor and feet exercises. I was racing to get up or on floor. Advertisement pics showed all on floor, not every other time up on feet. I‚Äôm hoping that as I get used to the movements, I will be doing them correctly before I‚Äôm halfway through the timer. It is vital to be doing these accurately so as not to injure myself &/or allow myself 2 seconds to figure out a modification (bad wrists).   SLOW DOWN for us 55+ peeps!!!
Title: First day

Content: It‚Äôs in you. I bought the app. Told myself I‚Äôd start that Sunday.  Took 6days when I said I‚Äôd start on Sunday. It‚Äôs Saturday now and no better time to start then right now. 200lbs 5‚Äô3. I‚Äôll give me testimonial update after 8-12 weeks. Also gotta eat right so it‚Äôs a journey. Very happy with Day 1. I‚Äôm a champion and so are you! 16-20 minutes  a day I can do for myself.
Title: Just Do It

Content: So far i love it!  Only problem is its not tracking my workouts. Probably something I'm doing wrong. I chose not to do the food plan or have trainers or have it notify me ect that  might be why.  I do the wall pilates then respond with i could do more and more come up!  I do on average 3 more the last being a stretch or cool down.
Title: First week

Content: It provides short but very focused workouts including stretching, rest, and cool down. With short workouts I feel like I have time to fit it in and actually look forward to it since it focuses on a different muscle group/type each day so I know I won‚Äôt have the ‚Äúhit by a bus‚Äù feeling afterwards.
Title: So many good things

Content: First of all, I would be remiss if I didn‚Äôt begin by stating that the customer service for this app was absolutely horrendous. Finding a way to simply contact someone regarding my subscription took far too much time. Additionally, there is absolutely no responsiveness. I was unable to find a way to cancel my subscription in the app. After sending an e-mail to cancel, I received no response. I have no clue if my cancellation was even processes and am waiting my next bill to see. Do not recommend this service.
Title: Is my subscription cancelled? Guess we‚Äôll wait and see

Content: This app seems to be a good tool to loose weight; however, I‚Äôm an ectomorph trying to gain weight and this app is absolutely useless. I told it my goal is to gain 10lbs, the first workout it gives me is ‚Äúbeginner fat burning‚Äù I have no fat. Just skin and bone. The at home workouts are almost completely weight loss oriented instead of muscle building. Half of each workout is stretches and the other half is yoga or cardio.  Bottom line: I would not recommend this app to someone trying to gain muscle/weight.
Title: Tried it for a month. Not as advertised.

Content: I love the way this app works and how consistent it helps you become.   However, when I decided to get a personal trainer I decided to cancel my subscription obviously. Yet I sent messages and emails and still I have been billed twice a month it seems.  When I finally received a response they said they couldn‚Äôt find me in their system. They can find my account though!  So, I‚Äôm sure this app would be good if I needed it. Just be sure that this is something you are going to do because you can‚Äôt back out of it.
Title: Love the persistence. Hate the resistance

Content: App offered free 7-day trial. App clearly stated that I would have to cancel the subscription before 7 day trial ended to avoid being charged. I followed the prompt to cancel through the app before the trial ended and was still charged. I'm only just noticing that this happened because after cancelling, I was unable to access the app's premium functions. That made me feel confident that I had successfully canceled, so I deleted the app and forgot all about it. I know that this sort of thing would normally be a billing issue on the apple iTunes side. But if I was billed, wouldn't that unlock the app's content? Kinda sketchy.
Title: Sketchy.

Content: This app looks very useful. It‚Äôs customizable for your problem areas. You put all your information problem areas, height, weight, and preferable foods. You can customize your meals for vegetarian, gluten-free, and more. And they also give you a custom weight and diet plan. Sadly, I just don‚Äôt have the money to pay six dollars a month for this app, or $60 for one time purchase. But if I did I would recommend it 10 out of 10.
Title: Monthly Payments?

Content: The visual example of someone doing the workout is helpful; however, it would be helpful to also have written instructions available. This way one could know more details as to how to do the exercise properly. Also, for the diet/food portion, it would be helpful to have a weekly grocery list available that includes the ingredients that will be mentioned in the recipes for that upcoming week.
Title: Lacks Necessary Tools

Content: Like a lot of people I see in the reviews, I downloaded this and did the 7 day trial and was charged $42 for the Premium subscription (which is the most expensive one I might add) without warning after the free trial was up. They give no option to cancel within the app, nor do they tell you how to cancel (I figured out how to cancel through the apple app store, but I‚Äôm still out $42).. I emailed their support requesting a refund, so hopefully they give me my money back because this is very frustrating and was very deceiving. Do not download unless you‚Äôre willing to spend money unknowingly.
Title: Deceitful App.. Very Disappointed

Content: While this app did not provide the level of guidance I was looking for in regards to intermittent fasting, this is a company with integrity and excellent customer service, which is very important to me. If you‚Äôre looking for an app that will help you stay on track with your diet and exercise, definitely give this one your consideration.
Title: Looking for intermittent fasting guidance

Content: I bought a 12 week subscription. It was about $25 and I used PayPal . The same day that I paid for that  there was a deduction of $0.99 by BetterMe from an account I had not authorized. Not sure if Apple, PayPal or BetterMe was responsible.  BetterMe responded quickly and refunded my money.  I did like the app and the way the wall Pilates workout is set up. I will probably try to buy it again.
Title: Fast response to complaint

Content: Aggressive sales - Continuously want to sell additional programs.  I signed up for one cost, the renewal month was an additional $9.00!  Subscriptions are AUTOMATICALLY renewed.  That is thievery and not a positive business practice for me, the consumer.  I decide when a product is worthy of renewal.    Not easy to navigate - Again, additional sales pitches for every icon.  Not user friendly at all!   I am not lazy, I am not inept, I am professional and do not have time to waste in maneuvering the app without any specific direction. Literally, a waste of time and money!
Title: Pushy in Sales & Not Easy to Navigate

Content: If you‚Äôre a checklist person, you‚Äôll probably like this app. The only thing I‚Äôm not really digging is that it‚Äôs not incredibly user friendly. I created settings when I first downloaded the app, and I‚Äôm unable to update them. To make matters worse, I reached out to the developer about it (because they don‚Äôt have FAQs in the app) almost a week ago with a question about it and have yet to hear from them. I‚Äôm going to make the best of my subscription, but I won‚Äôt be renewing.
Title: Not bad

Content: This app is ok if you are in perfect physical condition. However, starting me‚Äîa 64 year old with arthritic knees‚Äîat 10,000 steps per day, is ridiculous. Also, the meal plan doesn‚Äôt ask basic critical questions, like are you gluten-free, diabetic, etc. You get to select a few foods, what you will and won‚Äôt eat, but that leaves a huge amount of room for the plan to throw in stuff I can‚Äôt or won‚Äôt eat. Many of the exercises are movements I can‚Äôt do because of my knees. And in order to get a refund,I have to do the plan for 10 days, which is impossible. Chalk it up to a $35 mistake!
Title: Not for people with physical/medical issues

Content: I actually love this app it makes tired sure but it‚Äôs working I may tho cost money but u can just put the X on the left side and you will be available to do for free I‚Äôm in my first couple weeks and yeah it‚Äôs working! I definitely recommend using this app it also encourages to not stop losing hope and just give up 100% recommend downloading this app
Title: Awesome app üëè

Content: I was really interested when I saw the ad. As I set up my profile and answered questions, the app seemed to really know me. I got so excited!!   I removed the app because at no time did I see that it was required for me to pay. Had it been up front, I might‚Äôve done it anyway, since it seemed so tailored to me. Throwing it in at the end after I had filled out everything feels shady. I was disappointed and will pass. There are free ones out there, especially during a Pandemic.
Title: Almost great

Content: I made the mistake of ‚Äúgoing all in‚Äù and purchasing the full version of the app. I didn‚Äôt want the meals, but I had to pay an additional $20 just to be able to log water consumptionüôÑ  1. The food entry is horrible, there aren‚Äôt very many food options preloaded. There isn‚Äôt the ability to track servings.  2. Does not sync well with my Apple Watch for workouts. Certain workouts require that I wear/hold the phone to track calories burned and steps... that makes absolutely no sense to me.  3. There isn‚Äôt the ability to add exercises outside of the ones preloaded.  4. You can‚Äôt preview the workout before you begin. It would be nice to be able to view in advance what types of exercises are included in the workout.  I want my money back, this was so not worth the money. ($30/90 days fairly priced for an app that actually delivers + $20 to track water intake-completely unreasonable)
Title: Great idea in theory... does not deliver

Content: I will admit, this app does have great exercises but you have to pay for literally EVERYTHING!!!!!!! I got the app and have completed my first set of workouts for day one and was so excited to start day 2 but when I clicked on it, I found out, YOU HAVE TO BUY IT!!!!! What the heck is that all about?!?!? So a note for the developer, change it. Make the days for the set of workouts your given free and if they want the meal plan or a personal trainer or almost anything else, make them pay. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! Because all they want to do is steal your money!!!! I do not recommend this app unless the developer changes it
Title: Are you kidding me?!

Content: This app is great! And I was soo excited to start a workout to help me loose weight, but then after a day, I couldn‚Äôt even do the second workout without paying. I thought it wasn‚Äôt fair because I am young and i just wanted to workout and this was the best app for it until it started forcing me to pay. I was just disappointed because this app is great! But I do not want to pay more money just to workout.
Title: Great but disappointing

Content: Really like the app but not everyone wants to display progress on a social media platform. Maybe provide another option within the app by creating a comment board or buddy system. Some people‚Äôs transformations could be a little more challenging than others and want to keep it more private. Great programs for the different areas of the body!
Title: Like the app but...

Content: I am 7 week‚Äôs postpartum from a repeat c-section and I would consider myself pretty fit when I got pregnant. Beginning a recovery journey from 8+ weeks of restricted activity after major abdominal surgery, this was the perfect amount of work for me to jump into and it prompts the body to stretch which is also most important!
Title: Perfect

Content: Useless to me for my purposes. I want free weights, not cardio calisthenics. I requested a full refund. Waiting to hear back now. I have sent an email to the support group, as I have also done the in app chat messaging to support. After 48 hours there has been no response yet. Is this a shyster organization ‚Äî they will do everything to avoid refunding a disappointing, customer‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èStill no refund after multiple email exchanges! Avoid this product at all cost. There are too many alternatives that are far better.
Title: Useless to me. I want free weights, not calisthenics

Content: I was charged $52 for an app I never used and didn‚Äôt realize it until I received my bank statement.  I thought because I hadn‚Äôt started I wasn‚Äôt being charged.  Wrong!  You don‚Äôt even need to build a profile for them to grab your money.  They make it difficult to cancel if you change your mind after starting the app.  I am so mad!  Even if I wanted to use the app (now that I actually have time) I wouldn‚Äôt because they have already taken my money and I got nothing out of it.  I hate this app!
Title: Bad subscription design

Content: First, make sure you add the app to whichever device you will use to work out, you can‚Äôt switch between devices. I downloaded this app to my phone so I am stuck using my phone instead of IPad to work out.  Second, I‚Äôm currently locked out with the app saying my email is not recognized. I‚Äôve only received automatic replies to requests for help. It doesn‚Äôt feel like this app is well supported. I hope to get in to use the app  for the rest of the year I paid for.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I paid for a 28 day plan. My first issue is that when I filled out the questionnaire, I indicated I had knee problems. When I opened the 2nd day, most of the exercises would have exacerbated knee pain. My second issue is, I paid for 28 days but I have to complete each day before the next day is UNLOCKED. I should have access to all of the days since I paid for them so I can find the workouts I can do. Very disappointed.
Title: Not customized

Content: I never know what exercises to do. The beginning exercises are not intimidating and yet I break a sweat so I feel like I actually doing something. Because they are quick exercises I can add them to my morning routine without being too disruptive. On day  ‚Äî I‚Äôm looking forward to seeing how things progress.
Title: Gets me moving

Content: This app turned out to be WAY better than I thought it would be! Lots of FREE workouts and some other usage that I‚Äôve really been enjoying and benefiting from! I am about at the point to purchase the full app, and a good portion of the reason is the sale price. The regular price is a little steep, but the full version looks awesome and extremely helpful. Loving it!!
Title: Pleasantly surprised

Content: They should do a better job of syncing between mobile devices. I can‚Äôt seem to get it to work. It‚Äôs easier to see this on an iPad but you‚Äôre going to travel usually with just your phone‚Ä¶ it should be able to sync so I can pickup where we left off - because if it doesn‚Äôt then you can‚Äôt access the next workout.   so far the workouts are appropriate
Title: Sync between mobile devices

Content: I signed up via Instagram for $15. I used it one day and I was charged another $15. I didn‚Äôt click on any other feature like coach or calorie.  I just read that getting a  refund  is impossible . I emailed them about the charges from which I got an incident number but I have not gotten a response from the company. At this point I am writing this review so LESS PEOPLE get scammed. I have never gotten an APP that just charges you this way. I am upset because the wall pilates was SO fun.. Wish it was more user friendly and less predatory.
Title: 2 charges of $15 in 2 days ??? SCAM

Content: App is suuuuuper buggy. I have to force close and re-open it any time I‚Äôve had the app open for more than one minute. Also note that you cannot stack workouts if you miss a day. Bummer, I was looking to use this where I can stack a couple different workout 3 days a week to make more of a 30-45 minute session.  Wish you guys could fix the bugs. I won‚Äôt be re-purchasing this subscription when my trial is over.
Title: App is buggy and you can‚Äôt stack workouts if you miss a day

Content: During the workouts the videos sometimes play and sometimes they don‚Äôt. Sometimes the narration is present (without without the video), and other times it decides to take the session off.   It seems like a buggy app. Personally, the workouts are too short and I have to double up on them. I can‚Äôt find an easy way to change what I want to do in the app.   Finally, the app suggests the same workout for me every day so far, which is annoying.
Title: Good premise but buggy

Content: I‚Äôve just done Ex1 and enjoyed it.  Having not exercised in a very long time, it was a bit of a challenge, but the hardest for me was hearing (I‚Äôm partially deaf) the instructions and keeping up.  I wish just a few more seconds were built into the workout to understand and get into position.  Otherwise, very nice!!  Looking forward to more.
Title: Nice and easy but a little quick

Content: I have been using this app for 2 months. It is great regarding the exercise and tracking your meals. However, I choose my meal plan by mistake while trying to navigate the app the first time I tried to use it then I tried to change it I could not. I tried to communicate with the developers many times through the chat option but no response since last month. I hope with this review I would get my answer!!!!!
Title: Not to easy to contact or chat with the developers

Content: I am trying the meals and plan prescribed because I was denied a refund and per the policy a refund can only be granted if I document in phot and video as proof that I followed their plan and did not lose weight.  The meals look good however they are not customized meal plans as marketed.  I received the list of recipes that everyone else does. The recipes do not call for common ingredients nor do they offer substitution options so it will cost a fortune to strictly adhere to the plan.  They asked for my vegetable and meat choices as if my meal suggestions would be customized to my liking but they are not. Very disappointed and unsatisfied customer
Title: Deceiving

Content: I‚Äôm not much of a gym goer. It‚Äôs fun to be able to exercise at home and have a teacher showing you exactly what to do I like the pace and the music keeps moving. Great app and very little investment for what is offered. It‚Äôs the price of a single workout for a library of them. I would highly recommend this one.
Title: Love this app!

Content: I saw this on Pinterest and I downloaded it because I have major issues with my body. I hate the way it is. Now, this is Day 1 of this app and so far it‚Äôs pretty great! I‚Äôm going to keep it up and try to lose as much weight as possible! I do recommend this app as of now. Don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs going to continue because the best app for losing weight, that‚Äôs why I give it 4 stars. Thank you for making this app ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Seems pretty real

Content: I like what it has to offer so far however, in order to update your profile like add a pic, you have to sign in to Facebook. I loath Facebook. Don‚Äôt have it, never will. Also, can‚Äôt backtrack. I drank my full water yesterday but didn‚Äôt add it last night. There‚Äôs no option to adjust it. I see where it says the chat option is ‚Äòavailable‚Äô...that‚Äôs not true. The menu looks good and I like the exercises. Just started this and hope it gets better.
Title: Could use some adjustment

Content: Warning!  This app gives you NO ability that I can find to cancel during the trial period and there is NO button to turn off auto-renewal as they claim.  NONE within the app.  I even emailed the contact me email address and got no return email.  They are misleading and will grab you credit card info to charge you for the premium subscription and then give you NO way to cancel during the trial period and NO way to turn off auto-renewal.  Don‚Äôt fall for the scam!!!!!  I will have to have my credit card company deal with them because I‚Äôm telling the company not to pay this bill.
Title: DO NOT BUY!

Content: I downloaded the app thinking that it was free and i wasn‚Äôt going to have to pay anything. i‚Äôm a college student and i have bills to pay and i can‚Äôt just be flinging my money around so i was excited to see that there was a FREE exercising app. i did the first day, and it was good, i went to do the next day, and the app won‚Äôt let me complete my second day without purchasing this new part of the app that helps with dieting and stuff- which i don‚Äôt need. so now i can‚Äôt exercise because it won‚Äôt let me unlock it because i don‚Äôt want to buy it... FYI.. it asks for almost $200 a year just to exercise..
Title: Annoyed

Content: Started and was on workout 8 and all my processes and badges were reset. Emailed support on Monday and have yet to hear back. After reading some reviews it seems to have been a common situation with several other users during the same time period. I was really enjoying the app and had planned to keep the app after my 28 day challenge but have since decided to cancel. I‚Äôve told my friends about this app and recommended it to them and will be changing my story. Super disappointing.
Title: Technical issues - Lack of customer service

Content: So I definitely should‚Äôve looked into the reviews, They will over charge your phone/have hidden fees, And here is the kicker, They will ignore you when you try to get in contact with them. I just know they are hypocrites, for the fact that they would freak out and want answers if they where in our shoes. Shame to you and your families. Hope this message makes you feel some type of way and actually wanna fix the issue with not just me but everyone else complaining about the same issue.
Title: Beware they are thieves

Content: I love the features of the app and have raved to my friends and family about it. The disappointing part is that with the last update, it logged me out and I was unable to log back in by ANY means. I had only used a week of my 2nd paid month subscription. Tried contacting customer support without any response. You need a better way for customers to get the help they need faster.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I paid for 2 annual subscriptions, used the app for about 3 weeks and then got signed out. Lost all my progress and access to what I paid for. Tried resetting my password but keep getting messages saying my password can‚Äôt be reset because they didn‚Äôt recognize my email. Tried contacting support several times and the only response back is an auto generated message. There‚Äôs a request ID but apparently that‚Äôs just for show since nobody reaches out to assist. Completely frustrating and I want a refund. What a waste of money.
Title: Fraud

Content: I‚Äôve been looking at this app for a while. I purchased it to do wall pilates. I had no idea it came with all the other programs I‚Äôve been looking at like face yoga and hip hop dancing.  I rarely keep subscription services but there‚Äôs a ton of value in this one so I‚Äôll likely keep it and use it every day.
Title: Easy to use, lots of workouts

Content: Y‚Äôall I‚Äôm in love with this app I‚Äôm so happy that I seen this on ig I have no excuses now I can workout from home consistently. This was excellent and they put details on proper form it‚Äôs easy to determine how your form has to be for the work out thank you so much for making an excellent app. This is the type of motivation I needed I‚Äôm so happy ‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Brilliant

Content: The whole idea of the app and the look are great. The execution is really lacking and has a lot to be desired.   The app itself runs very slow on my new phone over WiFi. Most workouts I attempt to start are very hit and miss if they even load. Most of the time I‚Äôm quitting the app and hoping it works when I restart it.   Again, very nice idea and layout. If they can work on the actual performance of the app I‚Äôd be great.
Title: Nice Intentions

Content: I wish it was more interactive like Noom, but you can‚Äôt beat the lifetime price of $28 for all these trackers and meals I never knew about. Tracking isn‚Äôt complicated at all. Hopefully in the future they add an included/free interactive educational platform like Noon to encourage you to reach your goals through facts etc. Noom was way too expensive that‚Äôs why I went with BetterMe. Lifetime subscriptions are awesome.
Title: Not interactive

Content: The customer service for this app is absolutely horrifying. I am used to encountering poor customer service now and then; however, they have set a new standard. Ignoring concerns and patronizing are at the top of the list. When requesting a refund for unused subscription, I was given free months instead. Months of the service I disliked so much that I decided to stop it early. I essentially threw my money away with little to show for it. The app needs to be better and the service needs to be far better.
