Title: Liars- Scam of a company

Content: Purchased this program ($29.99) and something else within the program ($19.99) by mistake. When I contacted them I was told it was for the program yet now after less than 2 weeks the app stopped working and is now requesting I purchase the program again! They got $50 from me for an app I have not and cannot use!
Title: Waste of Money ‚ÄîScam

Content: I was really interested in started the 7day free trial and it promoted me to enter my credit card info, of course. It states before I signed up that if I wanted to discontinue my trial I would just have to contact the company 24hours before I was going to be charged for the 4 week plan. As soon as I emailed to discontinue, I was sent a automatic message that they were overwhelmed with customer support and would try they‚Äôre best to get back to me. Well, I was charged the $29.99 right after my ‚Äúfree‚Äù trial. I emailed again asking for a refund and this time, I received no response.  This month is almost over and I am concerned it‚Äôs going to keep charging me and not discontinue my membership that I originally asked for.  The app is nice but way to basic and every cost extra.   Sincerely,   Not a happy customer
Title: Scam

Content: Semi con: I purchased this app services ($29.99 on sale) plus an add on by accident ($19.99). *After I put my payment info on and clicked the add on I thought it would give me more information but it immediately purchased everything.* After purchasing and reviewing the app I realized very quickly that I wouldn‚Äôt be able to do the things the app wanted me to do regarding groceries. So I left it alone immediately to avoid complications with time usage and refunds. I tried to cancel the subscription and it wouldn‚Äôt let me.   Pros:  I contacted the company on the same day of the purchase and asked for a full refund, especially since I haven‚Äôt and didn‚Äôt plan on using the app.  Within a day I received a respectable response and a full refund.   With that being said, I would recommend this app to anyone who has the money, time, and dedication to get the necessary groceries and what not to maintain a healthy lifestyle.  Beautiful customer service, I am a very happy and satisfied customer. Thank you again Better Me !!
Title: Great Customer Service !!!

Content: After paying 39.99 for the use of this app and told I would receive meal plans...it did not deliver. It is 39.99 and and additional cost for meal plans, trainers etc. Total rip off! And when I brought my dissatisfaction to their attention they just took my 39.99 and said you have purchased this app whether you like it or not! DO NOT FALL INTO THIS TRAP!!!STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY!!!
Title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS APP

Content: I cancelled my subscription immediately after the first $29.99 drafted out of my account. This was my fault for not cancelling before the trial period ended. So, just checked my bank and of course another $29.99 drafted. I have reached out to customer service and now I‚Äôm waiting for their response.
Title: Cancelled subscription but still getting charged

Content: I hate this app I tried it recipes are incomplete and no wording of how to properly do an exercise. I have messaged 2 times for a refund after I paid $39.99 for this crap. And NO ONE gets back to me.
Title: This app stinks

Content: I purchased the $1 trial and I wasn‚Äôt impressed at all!  So I kept checking on my subscription settings to cancel before I get charged.  Well I got charged! On my iPhone the APP is not showing under subscription it‚Äôs only showing that I have it downloaded. I don‚Äôt want the subscription but the APP never gave me a chance to cancel! I just emailed and hope to get a refund. This APP is  horrible they have expensive In-APP purchases after a $29.99 charge!!  Scam!  If I get my refund I will edit my review.
Title: App is not allowing me to cancel

Content: I really excited to use this app, but then I got into it and was let down more than the extra 40 pounds I have to lose.   1. I was looking forward to the menu planning. The app even asked me foods I would like to incorporate. I was hopeful! Then I pulled up my first days meals and my balloon deflated! I got my hopes up again though when I saw I could change my meal options. I started to scroll through my choices, and scroll and scroll and scroll...and this was just breakfast!! There were foods on there I hadn‚Äôt even heard of and wouldn‚Äôt even know where to shop for them!! Even so, I kept on...I went through and found replacements for breakfast, snack and lunch, but at that point I was so frustrated and the disappointment was just too much. I decided to throw the towel in!  2. I looked up my banking info so I would have the info handy for when I emailed support to ask for my refund. Unfortunately, at that point I saw I was charged $14.99 twice, back to back.   3. I emailed support and explained my situation as I explained above. The ‚Äúsupport‚Äù consultant got back to me explaining I was not double charged. I was charged for the initial month and that I ‚Äúselected‚Äù (through complete confusion I‚Äôll add) an additional add-on for $9.99. Ok, sooo...where did the extra $14.99 come from then? I‚Äôm still waiting for a response.   Here‚Äôs the take away...I‚Äôm a busy mom with 3 active kids and I‚Äôm just trying to lose weight and get healthy like many others. I figured out that this program was in fact not for me, within the first week of downloading. They do GUARANTEE results. When you sign up online, you pay and get prompted to download the app. THEN you get prompted again, but it‚Äôs a little confusing, I thought I was then selecting the option I had already selected online, just now in the app. It‚Äôs no surprise though, apps and companies like this do these things all the time to just nickel and dime us consumers. They responded immediately to my first email telling me I was wrong and now they won‚Äôt answer my rebuttal. Well played BetterMe, well played. You get my money for nothing, but I‚Äôm still a better person than you, even if I do have 40 extra pounds.   STAY AWAY PEOPLE!!!
Title: HUGE Disappointment!!

Content: I thought this app would be a good fit to help me on my journey but NOPE! Day 1 I was supposed to get a detailed email formatted for me with all the information I provided within 24hrs.. it‚Äôs been almost 2 weeks and nothing. When I access the app (if I can) it‚Äôs limited access and I paid $29.99 anytime I select someone I‚Äôm being told to pay for access what‚Äôs the point. You can‚Äôt get help with anything and it‚Äôs all self serve.. I paid for have limited access to an application and no help.. I want my money back  **Update*** I received a reply back to my review to send an email, an email was sent before I wrote the review and still NO response to that email, so what‚Äôs the resolution. Still no access and you have my money still. Am I to continue to write emails with no responses.. just DON‚ÄôT download this app
Title: Not worth it

Content: Was never able to log into the app had $1 taken out with some unknown company named memotre after I was told nothing would be taken out of my account that I still had no access to another $39.99 was taken out of my account and don‚Äôt even have anybody to talk to about it
Title: Scam

Content: Just a tip of advice for anyone who believes what they promise in the premium version. I paid the $29.99 for it and my account hasn‚Äôt changed one bit from the free to premium. I requested a refund and was told it was a non refundable item and I should have read the terms. No apologies no trying to fix things just took my money and have been nothing but rude about the matter. The premium version is a complete scam for anyone considering it. Extremely disappointed.
Title: Do not buy the premium version!!

Content: I decided to try this app on Monday and today is Thursday. First I thought I got a free trial which I didn't... so I was charged &29.99 for ONE month! I contacted customer service and got a very lagging response and questioned why I got no free trial. They said oh you signed up for a month when on the website I clicked the try free button. Okay- fast forward to Wednesday... I contacted them because I do not like some of the meal options. They gave me instructions that I went to follow but not all the buttons were there. I contacted them AGAIN with more pictures explaining I do not have the buttons I should to change things. Then they contacted me back saying I'm logged out when I'm not. Also trying to "unsubscribe" is a hassle. The website kept kicking me out and saying error on their side. So I had to email multiple times saying that I wanted to unsubscribe. To top off poor customer service, they keep referring to me as girl...not by my name! So I feel like this app is a money scam. Horrible experience to the point where I won't use the app but to each their own I guess.

Title: Horrible App. - Don‚Äôt buy it!!

Content: Okay, so it sounds like an awesome plan.  I purchased it for $29.99. Everything I wanted I thought was included. Unfortunately, I would have had to spend extra money to get.  When I realized this, I immediately reached out to Better Me and  wanted to cancel and get a refund, I was told no. After asking for several days (4) to be exact, they are now offering 1/2 of my money back.   I contacted them within a 1/2 hour of purchasing the plan. After downloading their app, going through it, seeing that at every turn in it, I am asked to purchase something in order to use it. This, after spending $29.99?!   I know $29.99 is not a great deal of money, but it‚Äôs the principal. If you want a great diet/weight loss app/plan? I would encourage you to look elsewhere. This simply is not it.
Title: Felt like a rip off from get go

Content: My boyfriend and I cancelled our subscription 10 months ago and just got charged $59.99 out of no where. We have tried to email them from their website, which was not a valid email. We tried direct messaging them on Facebook AND Instagram. We left a bunch of comments on different posts. We even tried contacting the CEO. ABSOLUTELY NOTHING IN RESPONSE. Terrible customer service.   While I did leave comments on their Instagram, I did see that this has happened to a number of people. People who haven't been replied to, people who have been scammed, people who called them thieves. This is unjust and fraud. I will take legal action if this does not get solved IMMEDIATELY.
Title: Been Charged Even Though I Cancelled 10 Months Ago

Content: One thing I really loved about this app is that the workouts were separated by levels as well as the type of workout you were doing. That version was so much more efficient and for me, much less confusing and intimidating once I started working out at home. Now the workouts are thrown in whatever category and there‚Äôs no section for walking/running anymore. I really enjoy this app but at this point I might as well go back to youtube.

Title: App is not for me & horrible customer service

Content: I paid for personalized meal plan and exercises and tips... $39.99 for 6 months, the meals, some are really high in calories, (which means I could eat two meals a day only), I chose three main meals... so it‚Äôs not personalized, not enough choices and bunch of ingredients that bet most of us don‚Äôt keep at home, not even people that eat clean... bunch of commercial every where offering me to pay for another challenge, another meal plan, hello!!!! I already paid!!! Anyway, why so many?!?!? I could understand some for people looking ‚Äúfor more‚Äù than what it was paid for, but I think it‚Äôs too much advertising....

Content: 19.99for nothing that you‚Äôre promised. Not worth it at all and now It won‚Äôt let me cancel the subscription
Title: Not worth the money

Content: TOTAL SCAM! Do not download the free trial of this because even if you try to cancel, the company will not respond and you will be charged the full price. My e-mail reference number is 329162 if someone could get back to me and refund my money that would be great. Thanks.
Title: Trial

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for about a week and have found that I hate it more than I like it.  All in all, I‚Äôve already canceled my subscription but locked myself into the 3 month plan so hopefully they make huge improvements during that time!  If they are going to provide a meal plan, the meal plan nutritional information should already be in the catalog for me to just click on, instead of inputting each micronutrients individually.  I have a keto lifestyle but the meals provided will take me out of ketosis, they should do a better job of vetting the meals before adding them as part of the plan.  Also, because the nutritional database is so limited, the bar scan is almost useless; I‚Äôve had to ‚Äúadd meal‚Äù more often than not.  Additionally, the 20 min workouts are not worth the money.  There is no audible cue that lets you know you‚Äôre moving from one workout to the next so I‚Äôm stuck staring at my phone pretty much the entire time.  There is no real explanation of each move which could easily result one someone hurting themselves.  Additionally, I paid for the live coach feature but the only time ‚Äúthe coach‚Äù checked in was to invite me to a workout challenge that costed an additional $10 on top of what I paid for the 3 month subscription!    Also, the layout of the app is not the best, or maybe there are still some bugs to be worked out.  I fast from 9pm til 1pm but there is no alarm or reminder to use the fasting option daily and it doesn‚Äôt start/stop on its own.  This would be a great feature to add for those new to fasting.  The app is minimal at best.  Lastly, in the box used to provide feedback, there is no autocorrect.  This isn‚Äôt the biggest issue, but if I‚Äôm taking the time to provide useful feedback, the least the app could do is make it as easy as possible for me.
Title: The potential is there but not worth the current price

Content: There is no human on the other side. No customer support even to answer a simple question. You will be better of just buying a fitness book and a journal, at least it will be easier to log your calories and you will not worry about double charges. Disclamer: I spent $39.99 on this so joke is on me
Title: Do not recommend

Content: The app has charged me $29.99 despite the fact that I have not used it once. I have subscribed accidentally and they informed me that I am not eligible for a refund.
Title: No refund

Content: Update-It took about 2 weeks of back and forth emailing, in which they would respond within a day or 2 at the most.  Now, my app is working right!   Once their food database is fully loaded with items, it will be awesome!  So when I first started the app, last week, it was awesome.  I love that it has food plan laid out for you, with an easy add to shopping list. I lost 3 #s my first week.  Now, I am locked out of the food plans, it keeps wanting me to restore purchases too. Right before the food locked, it wasn‚Äôt logging my food either. And some other minor things, like trying to log your calories by doing a search. Example- the recipe is called Cod with Italian beans casserole. You won‚Äôt t find it if you start the search with cod, or with Italian beans. I found it under Italian bean casserole.  Plus whatever I am able to log, when I look at the profile, my calorie intake is double.  I have emailed and haven‚Äôt had a response. 316336.  This could be a great app!! I am hoping they will fix my lock out. Either that or give me my money.  A lot of the reviews are not so great. Wonder how it‚Äôs rated 4.5 stars.
Title: Has potential

Content: I was into the 2nd day on a 7 day trial and attempted to cancel. It was not listed on subscriptions on my ICloud account and the only way to cancel was to send them an email. They sent an auto-response ‚Äòdue to covid‚Äô and never got back with me.5 days later, billed my account for $29.99. What scammers! I will dispute the charge as thankfully I kept my email that requested the cancellation.
Title: Don‚Äôt purchase this app!

Content: I purchased a plan for $39.99 from BetterMe and I downloaded the app on my phone. The meal plans and exercise plans were not what I expected, at all. The meal plan is pretty odd.  I tried to cancel my subscription with BetterMe following their directions. I went into my iPhone settings to try and cancel. Strangely, the subscription in my phone claims that BetterMe has never changed me any money. The balance in my iPhone says $0.00. However, this is NOT true. $39.99 was taken out of my bank account and went to BetterMe. This discrepancy seems very shady to me.  To top it off, there is NO cancel subscription option in my iPhone settings for this app. I have no way to cancel the subscription. This is all very shady in my opinion and I‚Äôm currently in communication with my bank and BetterMe to make sure my subscription is cancelled.  Huge hassle, the plan isn‚Äôt worth it. Don‚Äôt waste your time or money!
Title: This App is Shady

Content: I downloaded this app to use for intermittent fasting and that function disappeared on day 2 of using it. I have been contacting customer support for 3 weeks now without reply to cancel my subscription. Would not recommend this app at all! Satisfaction guaranteed or you get a refund is total BS - fine print says it‚Äôs at their discretion only. Don‚Äôt do it! 302609 - case number

Content: This feels absolutely like a scam. No way to call a customer service. No one ever ever replied. All the service can be reached out to one email address. And I can‚Äôt believe the company only replies on google play review when people give them 1 star complaining about the same problem and then they got their money back.

Title: Very bad

Content: I never write reviews, but this one boils my blood. I paid for a $42 custom meal plan that was supposed to be delivered to my email. It didn‚Äôt arrive. I was pushed to this app (in the same process) and filled in some high level dietary restrictions, which didn‚Äôt even match the previous options, and got some ridiculous meal options for items your average person doesn‚Äôt keep on hand. On top of that, there was no rhyme or reason (major calorie swings) and it didn‚Äôt even follow the minor options chosen. This is NOT what I paid for. The app is shoddy, and I‚Äôm sure a lot of these glowing reviews are FAKE. I started emailing the company immediately for a refund and haven‚Äôt received a response. I attempted to reach out through PayPal, but they used a third party for the charge. S.C.A.M. BUYER BEWARE.  Updating to add: I have 2 auto responses, first #299954, second #301481. My last 4 emails did not receive an auto response.
Title: SCAM SCAM SCAM

Content: I honestly can‚Äôt say how the app is, but what I do know is that it was delivered as an intermittent fasting app and it‚Äôs not. Title: Customer service

Content: I‚Äôve now paid twice for this app and it keeps locking me out!!!    Everything is going fine and then like this morning I go to open the app and all the meals are locked out!??  Asks me to restore purchase or continue for only $29.99. IVE DONE THIS. Even if I click on it it says ‚Äúyou‚Äôre already subscribed‚Äù. Yes I know! Why won‚Äôt it let me open my meals I picked for today!!?   I bet if I was to delete the app and open it back up it would work. (I‚Äôve tried logging out/in) as I‚Äôve done this before but that deletes all your data and I‚Äôve already been using this a week now and have all my meals logged and picked in a grocery shop list going!  (This happened twice before already‚ÄîI‚Äôm asking myself why I‚Äôm continuing but the app is really great‚ÄîIF IT WORKS!  It‚Äôs just unpredictable when I‚Äôm gonna be locked out of meals)   This is really annoying! The developers did reach out to me but I haven‚Äôt heard anything back from my response from issues. Maybe they will see this.   I want to use this app and I really like this app but when you‚Äôre trying to keep things moving and want to access your meals that you‚Äôve spend time choosing and planning but it‚Äôs  locked out, it throws a wrench in the entire day!!  Waste of time and energy and money right now.   Please fix this issue!!!!!!  iPhone XS  iOS 13.6.1 (latest)

Title: No support and a lot of issues!

Title: Horrible Experience

Content: I purchased this app 2 days ago and I really wish it came with a free trial. I‚Äôm a picky eater and even though i completed the survey in the beginning, the recipes are not of the things that I like to eat. Which causes me to manually enter in the foods I eat EVERY SINGLE TIME I EAT, because it only saves the most recent 10 items. I spend more time adding my meals than i do exercising. I spent $29.99 for 3 months and after 2 days I‚Äôm irritated and want to delete the app. Had there been a free trial, I wouldn‚Äôt have wasted my money!!
Title: Where is the free trial?

Content: Appears to be a scam. Seen the add to get weight loss meal plans, so I paid 19.99. Went to click on the meal plans and it wants me to pay again.
Title: Not what it seems!

Content: The word personal has been taken out of personal training. When I signed up for this, it looked like a great idea of accountability for weight loss by exercise, diet and other features. I purchased the plan as well as additional funds for the different challenges. Yet when I asked the personal trainer assigned me a question, the suggestion I got was to participate in a particular challenge Dash a challenge I was not only signed up for but paid for.One would think that a purchased at with also purchased challenges would not have that redundancy and neglecting to see what I am and I am not signed up for. When I address this, I was told that some messages are automated. Those automated messages are obvious. However, the ones I am referencing or not automated I asked about receiving a refund and could not get a straight answer. I had to ask multiple times. Then they reference me to someone else.
Title: Misleading: Better Me Needs Better App

Content: I‚Äôve been using the app for a while, and I would say it‚Äôs really convenient and helpful. It‚Äôs the only one that I‚Äôve actually been consistent with because it is consistent with me. I use the regular reminders as an extra push and motivation for me to stand up and work out. The training plans fit my demands perfectly, I also like that there are video instructions, as it‚Äôs a bit difficult to understand it from words. Besides, they have a huge collection of recipes and meal plans, so if you want to follow their dietary options, it is really convenient. Each meal there fits my demands.Overall, definitely recommend for everyone looking for a simple and efficient app for weight loss and training.
Title: Convenient!

Content: This company is based in Ukraine. They unauthorized 29.99 from my account 1 week after I signed up for a 15.99 workout subscription. Why the hell would you guys charge me exactly 1 week after that an additional 29.99 dollars?! Your phone number that PayPal gave me doesn‚Äôt work and I have yet to hear back from a rep about refunding me. The app isn‚Äôt even worth the 30 bucks much less a penny more. GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK NOW!!!!!!!
Title: Scammers

Content: Don‚Äôt spend your time and money on an app that doesn‚Äôt work and a company that doesn‚Äôt care.   Here is what doesn‚Äôt work -if I adjust a setting, the app does not update with that changed setting -if I have my meal plan set to fasting it still reminds me to eat breakfast.  -when does it remind me? Around noon, because time zone settings do not work -time does not work, neither do dates. It is perpetually 12/31/2020 -the vegetarian meal plan is still full of meat -the app accesses your Health app data, but does nothing with it. Title: In-app purchase

Content: I gained a lot of weight over the years after having two kids. I didn‚Äôt want to join a gym since I‚Äôm a busy mom. So it was important to me to find an app geared towards beginners with exercises that didn't need special equipment and could be done at home. I came across BetterMe app and decided to give it a go. In my opinion, it is way more affordable than regular sessions with a personal trainer or nutritionist. Not gonna lie, I was a bit skeptical about the workouts since I‚Äôm a total beginner. Each workout (I started with those targeting butt and arms) was super intense but doable. The app provides detailed workout, nutrition, and body measurement planning, tracking, and analysis.  Meal plans are super customizable and I really like that. As someone with too many dietary restrictions, I loved that I could select specific ingredient to leave out. I give it 4 stars since I'm not sure that all the exercises are knee-friendly. I think that some people should take this fact into account before starting some workouts.
Title: Great At Home Workouts

Content: I purchased this app based on information I was given by an advertisement online. I thought I‚Äôd get a personalized meal plan, but did not. The app asks for your preferences on food, workouts and your goals. A lot of the foods I was provided were the foods I said I do not want. The app told me how many calories I needed to achieve my goals, but the foods for the entire day were not meeting that. The calories for the meals they provided were significantly less than what my goals were. I feel the plan is too expensive for me to have to work on a plan that was supposed to be provided. I attempted to get my money back the same day I purchased, but was unsuccessful in doing so. I contacted them and instead of receiving a refund, they gave me advice on how to use the app. The second time I contacted them, it was the same result. I do not recommend this app. During these tough times, I have lost $40 to something I will never use. Email #277197  I was recently contacted in regard to this review, and BetterMe gave me a full refund. I appreciate the refund.

I love the interval running and strength workouts! It also logs your water intake, steps and weight.

Title: Shady

Content: This app is pretty great if you have a pantry and fridge full of ingredients to make the recipes they offer through the app. There is no way to enter your own food as you might be able to do on apps like MyFitnessPal. This app offers you an array of meals for your personalized fitness plan but unless you are making those exact meals you cannot track what you are eating. Paying $50/year for a bunch of workouts is not worth it considering you can find them for free on YouTube and Pinterest.   Another downside is that you cannot enter your own daily calorie goal. It sets the goal for you and in my opinion it sets it too high. It does adjust calories (more for workout days and less for non-workout days), but again, not worth the money. Title: FIX THIS

Content: My experience with this app was noting but horrible and frustrating.   I saw an ad for it on Pinterest and wanted to download to check out if it offers anything more than the workout app I currently have.   During the download process it asked for me to authorize the download. And then I think it asked me to acknowledge the TOS.  When I was trying to I acknowledge it, the screen was frozen. So I put my thumb on the Home button just hoping to get through that step.  After a second or two, there‚Äôs a spinning wheel that kept spinning and spinning...  when it‚Äôs done spinning it displayed a message saying something about a charge of $119+.  I was like ‚ÄúWHAT???‚Äù   I removed my thumb as fast as I could but the screen went away already before I had a chance to read it.   I was like ‚Äúhell No!  I hope I didn‚Äôt just get charged!‚Äù   I checked my bank right away but didn‚Äôt see a charge.  I thought ok maybe that was just a glitch.   I then downloaded the app and took a look at it.   The workout routine it offered was just some pictures with descriptions in writing on how to do each pose.  I was thinking wow this is pretty crude.  All the other workout applications I downloaded have at least video clips showing how to do each routine.  Who has time to read through text to learn to do a workout?   So I closed the app and never used it.   A couple of days later I found out I was charged $129.89 for a yearly subscription for this app.  I do not know it was a technical glitch or a deliberate design, they charged me $119+ tax upfront without offering me a chance to read or select payment options.  I would have denied it for sure for something trying to charge me upfront without giving me a chance to try.  That was the start of the nightmare.  I then tried to go to the app to find someone to chat.  The chat window didn‚Äôt work and always showed the advisors were offline.  I read through their help trying to find a way to cancel and get a refund but what they told you you could cancel from your account was a lie.  There‚Äôs no option to cancel from within the app.   I then tried to cancel the subscription from iPhone settings.  It said if I cancel I have another year to enjoy the app.  I did not want another year!  I wanted to just cancel and get a refund for an app I never used and never will given the bad experience.   I then tried again from the app and finally was able to find someone on the chat.  This time he sent me a link to ask for refund from the App Store.  I followed the link and requested a refund.  Two days later I didn‚Äôt hear back anything.  So I went to that link again and submitted another request for refund.  This time I got an instant response on the screen saying sorry I was not qualified for an refund.  I had to go out my of way to finally foind an apple support number to call and told them my whole experience with the download and charge without offering me a chance to read and  decline the charge.  Thank goodness the apple support lady was very nice and listened to me.  She told me she had similar complaints about this exact app.  She gave me the refund back.  That was a lot of time wasted just trying to get a refund for something I do not want.  Be aware if you want to try this app.   Make sure you read through the TOS very carefully and make sure you do not accidentally authorize a charge thinking you are just authorizing a free download.

Title: not a free trial

Content: When looking at the app description for some reason I thought there would be more questions about my body type and issues. They give 4 issues, I think they‚Äôre: flabby arms, saggy breasts, flabby tummy and thick thighs. I also thought it would be more tied together. There is a workout section and you choose which category of workout you‚Äôd like to pursue (abs vs butt vs general fit- that kind of thing). With the food they give you several categories to choose from, I think they were: normal, gluten-free, vegetarian, Keto and one more I can‚Äôt remember. Then the calendar comes up and each day you get three meals and two snacks.  Recommendations for Better Me: In the calendar each week has certain items that are used throughout- so you aren‚Äôt shopping for a little but if this and that  Highlight one or two categories of exercise you recommend to start with  When you open the calendar/menu for the first time have a introduction into that type of eating with tips. There should definitely be a list of staple replacements such as (and again I‚Äôm making up the details in the examples): white rice -> brown rice Or quinoa ... milk chocolate -> dark chocolate. There should be a list basics and supplements.   This is a big one- give TIPS throughout as quick to read pop-ups that relate to what we‚Äôre looking at. For example- when exercise comes up say ‚Äúgo easy to start if you aren‚Äôt used to working out. For the first few days limit yourself to 15 min max.‚Äù(I made that obviously but you get the point). If I felt you were watching over me and the app felt like a friend I would feel more obligated plus I would have my hand held. And of course you can have a setting that turns them off if you want. You could even have fun facts pop-up like ‚ÄúKetosis is a normal metabolic process. When the body does not have enough glucose for energy, it burns stored fats instead.‚Äù  Anyway, thanks for a nice looking, easy to use app. I do like that it is uncomplicated. I would like to keep that feel but I would like it to guide me more. I am excited to try it. I‚Äôll update my review after a month as that is when I‚Äôm supposed to reach my goal weight!

Title: Outrageous

Content: Let me tell you what‚ÄîI have been up and down the scale more than I can say and I‚Äôve done so many workout apps and calorie counting apps and this one is BY FAR the BEST app I‚Äôve ever encountered. It‚Äôs so simple! Every other app is has so much to them; layers and layers of calorie counting, workouts that I‚Äôve never even heard of, nutritional servings out the butt (I literally don‚Äôt need to know anything other than calories consumed and calories burned, otherwise I‚Äôll go insane at the amount of mono and poly saturated crap etc., I‚Äôm consuming and get hella burnt out).  This app gives you workouts that anyone can do and you start out easy! I‚Äôm incredibly out of shape and even the beginner workouts get me huffing and puffing but they give you the option to pause during a workout which is such a necessity in my position and as such I don‚Äôt feel pressured to get a workout done and not feel good about finishing it. It allows me to finish in my own time and at my own pace. The meal planning. OH the meal planning. I‚Äôve tried and tried and tried to plan meals for weeks even months in advance and I fail to go further than a week. Better Me generates meal plans for MONTHS ahead! It‚Äôs a dream come true! They give you the option of any dietary restrictions you may have (I‚Äôm gluten intolerant) and if you don‚Äôt really care for the foods they list out, you can choose to keep the ones you do like and regenerate a new set of recipes daily! It‚Äôs amazing. I can‚Äôt get enough words out to express how everyone should at LEAST take a chance with this app. It‚Äôs definitely better than I could have imagined and even though I moan and groan about the workout reminders every morning, they‚Äôre right when they say 80% of people who set reminders to workout ACTUALLY do it! I feel guilty if I don‚Äôt and then I have to go and actually delete the notification so I‚Äôll end up seeing it anyways. Way to go Better Me! Thank you for reaching out to the people who can‚Äôt even CrossFit their shoelaces without wanting to die.

Content: I started the free trial and only agreed to it because I was under the impression that if I didn‚Äôt cancel it then it would be $9.99 a month. As soon as I went in today (the last day of my trial) to cancel it, the app had already charged $41.99 to my account. I called apple to try to get it refunded but apparently this app is not eligible for refund. If they are going to automatically charge for the entire 6-month value, instead of $9.99 a month, then an e-mail or pop-up notification would have been nice to give me a reminder that the trial was ending. I‚Äôm not saying the app is bad, because I actually like it, but there are many other apps out there that give you a warning that your trial is ending and you will be charged, or they just close you out of the app features once the trial is up. I feel like I‚Äôve been scammed so beware of that when you download this app.

Title: Basic AF

Its quite frustrating. Also, when i first started using it it askedfor my information and showed me all the thigs i can do with the app if i subcribe but i dont see any of that stuff. Annoying! Also, when i downloaded the app it didnt give me an option to select a subscription type, so im trying out this app for free for a week,  actually, i wanted to hold off on that because i wanted to get some things figured out before i started. So now im wasting that free trial and if i dont cancel the subscription, i will be charged $49.99 or something like that when i didnt choose that plan nor was i given the chance to start the free trial when i was ready. Anyway,  i think the workouts are great, the meals they have are cool too but it doesnt give you any nutritional information. I think this app has potential for improvement.   PS as i mentioned above, for some reason i cant see any of the workouts or start one because it says that it lost connection. All my other apps and browser open up fine and work perfectly. Its just this app that keeps doing that. Additionally, i keep having to log in my information every time i open the app. can someone please fix the problem? Its getting in the way of my free trial.

Title: AVOID

Content: First off the three day trial is a joke. I was charged $9.99 a total of 8 times because the app errors out when you try to use the 3day trial and charges you instead. I deleted this scam of an app and got a refund straight from Apple. Avoid this deliberate scam of an app that has far less content for the same price as other health and fitness apps.  Response to developer:  I would love to have been able to have a 3 day trial but I was charged 8 times in 20 minutes because your app continued to have errors every time I tried to sign up. Fix your app so that it doesn‚Äôt keep charging someone over and over. Once you subscribe once it shouldn‚Äôt continue to over lap and subscribe 8 times. My wife wanted to use your app but because of this poor design decision I‚Äôve deleted it and got my refund from Apple. BTW I know how the subscription system works. It‚Äôs hard to unsubscribe when you‚Äôve already been charged 79.92.....

Title: Voice feature

Content: This app is not as advertised. I was prompted on snap chat and decided to download the app as my wedding is coming up soon so I‚Äôm trying to get more out of my already active lifestyle. Anyways, it stayed it was free but as soon as I downloaded it I was prompted to confirm my billing. I wasn‚Äôt sure if this was from the new update from Apple as I hadn‚Äôt installed any apps since the latest update. So, I confirmed. Then the app prompts you to start inputting information as if the app is free. About half way through it then says sign up for your FREE 3 day trial and then get billed 19.99 a month after that?! That‚Äôs more than a basic gym membership and the price of a full membership at planet fitness and Golds Gym. So then I screen shot their billing process information. I didn‚Äôt continue but if you do not use all of your 3 days consecutively you forfeit the remaining time. All of this seems sketchy. Also your time starts from the moment you sign up so don‚Äôt sign up at night! Apps like these consumers should be able to report to Apple as ripoffs.
